temples.name: Salt Lake Utah Temple
temples.address: 50 W North Temple St, Salt Lake City, Utah 84150
temples.oschedule: Please call for our ordinance schedule
temples.sschedule: 6am to 7pm, every hour on the hour
temples.history: The Salt Lake City temple was announced 28 July 1847. Groundbreaking began 14 February 1853. It was dedicated on 6 April 1893.

temples.name: Los Angeles California Temple
temples.address: 10777 Santa Monica Blvd, Los Angeles, California, 90025
temples.oschedule: Please call for our ordinance schedule.
temples.sschedule: 5:30am to 7:30pm, every one hour and forty-five minutes
temples.history: Announced 6 March 1937. Groundbreaking began 22 September 1951. Dedicated 11 March 1956.

temples.name: Seattle Washington Temple
temples.oschedule: Please call for our ordinance schedule.
temples.sschedule: 5:30am, 6:30am, 7:30pm, and 8am to 7pm every hour on the hour
temples.history: Announced on 15 November 1975. Groundbreaking began 27 May 1978. Dedicated on 17 November 1980.

temples.name: Atlanta Georgia Temple
temples.address: 6450 Barfield Rd NE, Sandy Springs, Georgia, 30328
temples.oschedule: Please call for our ordinance schedule.
temples.history: Announced 2 April 1980. Groundbreaking 7 March 1981. Dedication: 1 June 1983, rededications 14 November 1997 and 1 May 2011.
